snippet.title: Raising the Bar: Salvation - Release Update
snippet.description:
The 1.0 release of Salvation, the tale of Grigori's exodus from Ravenholm, is now here! Master the zombie-infested town and burn it behind you; take the Deathless challenge; and discover hidden truths about Grigori's loss.

Article edition: https://www.moddb.com/mods/half-life-2-raising-the-bar-salvation/news/half-life-2-raising-the-bar-salvation-10-release-update
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Step closer, kin of our kin, for we have gospel to share. Having delivered the One Free Man to safety, Father Grigori, Archangel of Ravenholm, must now make his final exodus - and bury the town he once held so dear beneath ash.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ModDB: https://www.moddb.com/mods/half-life-2-raising-the-bar-redux 
Salvation: https://www.moddb.com/mods/half-life-2-raising-the-bar-salvation

Discord: https://discord.gg/d52hWkR 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/rtb_redux

Casting Call Club: https://www.castingcall.club/projects/raising-the-bar-redux

Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/raisingthebarredux
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
